I'd be happy to help you create a spreadsheet template to track your leads and follow-ups from the trade shows. Here's a suggested template you can use as a starting point:

**Trade Show Lead Tracking Template**

**Sheet 1: Lead List**

| Column A: Lead ID | Column B: Company Name | Column C: Contact Name | Column D: Email | Column E: Phone | Column F: Job Title | Column G: Industry/Category |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| 2 |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| 3 |  |  |  |  |  |  |

**Sheet 2: Follow-up Tracker**

| Column A: Lead ID | Column B: Follow-up Date | Column C: Follow-up Type (Email/Phone/Meeting) | Column D: Follow-up Notes | Column E: Next Follow-up Date | Column F: Status (New, Follow-up, Closed Won, Closed Lost) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 |  |  |  |  |  |
| 2 |  |  |  |  |  |
| 3 |  |  |  |  |  |

**Sheet 3: Additional Notes**

| Column A: Lead ID | Column B: Notes |
| --- | --- |
| 1 |  |
| 2 |  |
| 3 |  |

Here's a brief explanation of each column:

**Sheet 1: Lead List**

* Lead ID: Assign a unique ID to each lead for easy tracking.
* Company Name: Record the company name of the lead.
* Contact Name: Record the contact person's name.
* Email: Record the contact's email address.
* Phone: Record the contact's phone number.
* Job Title: Record the contact's job title.
* Industry/Category: Record the industry or category the lead belongs to (e.g., IT, Healthcare, Manufacturing).

**Sheet 2: Follow-up Tracker**

* Lead ID: Match the Lead ID from Sheet 1 to link the follow-up activity to the corresponding lead.
* Follow-up Date: Record the date of each follow-up activity.
* Follow-up Type: Indicate the type of follow-up (Email, Phone, Meeting).
* Follow-up Notes: Record any notes or comments from the follow-up activity.
* Next Follow-up Date: Schedule the next follow-up date.
* Status: Update the status of the lead (New, Follow-up, Closed Won, Closed Lost).

**Sheet 3: Additional Notes**

* Lead ID: Match the Lead ID from Sheet 1 to link the notes to the corresponding lead.
* Notes: Record any additional notes or comments about the lead that don't fit in the other columns.

You can customize this template to fit your specific needs by adding or removing columns as necessary. Remember to save the template and update it regularly to track your leads and follow-ups effectively.

If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
